                                        Nuclear medicine center - clinique des grangettes
                                    
                                https://www.hirslanden.ch/en/clinique-des-grangettes/centres-et-instituts/nuclear-medicine-center.html
                                
                                    The specialized nuclear medicine center of the Clinique des Grangettes and its expert doctors welcome you from January 1, 2023.
                                
                            
                        

                            
                                
                                    
                                        Hospital internal medicine department
                                    
                                https://www.hirslanden.ch/en/clinique-des-grangettes/centres-et-instituts/internal-medicine.html
                                
                                    The Grangettes Hospital Internal Medicine Department treats medical pathologies requiring urgent or elective hospitalization. 
                                
                            
                        

                            
                                
                                    
                                        Institute of radiology and nuclear medicine at klinik st. anna
                                    
                                https://www.hirslanden.ch/en/klinik-st--anna/centers/institute-of-radiology-and-nuclear-medicine.html
                                
                                    With over 70 members of staff, the Institute of Radiology and Nuclear Medicine at Klinik St. Anna is your first port of call for clarification of complex clinical pictures. 
                                
                            
                        

                            
                                
                                    
                                        Sports medicine st. anna im bahnhof
                                    
                                https://www.hirslanden.ch/en/klinik-st--anna/centers/sports-medicine.html
                                
                                    Sport Medicine St. Anna im Bahnhof is located on the 5th floor of Lucerne railway station and is committed to the prevention, diagnosis and treatment of injuries and diseases affecting the musculoskeletal system. 
                                
                            
                        

                            
                                
                                    
                                        Clinic for sleep medicine
                                    
                                https://www.hirslanden.ch/en/klinik-st--anna/centers/clinic-for-sleep-medicine.html
                                
                                    KSM Clinic for Sleep Medicine is a hospital specialising in sleep and, with its main location in Bad Zurzach and two further hospitals in Lucerne and Zurich, is an independent subsidiary of the Zurzach Care group of companies.

                                        Symposia and medical training

                                        Nuclear medicine center - clinique des grangettes
                                    
                                https://www.hirslanden.ch/en/clinique-des-grangettes/centres-et-instituts/nuclear-medicine-center.html
                                
                                    The specialized nuclear medicine center of the Clinique des Grangettes and its expert doctors welcome you from January 1, 2023.
                                
                            
                        

                            
                                
                                    
                                        Hospital internal medicine department
                                    
                                https://www.hirslanden.ch/en/clinique-des-grangettes/centres-et-instituts/internal-medicine.html
                                
                                    The Grangettes Hospital Internal Medicine Department treats medical pathologies requiring urgent or elective hospitalization. 
                                
                            
                        

                            
                                
                                    
                                        Institute of radiology and nuclear medicine at klinik st. anna
                                    
                                https://www.hirslanden.ch/en/klinik-st--anna/centers/institute-of-radiology-and-nuclear-medicine.html
                                
                                    With over 70 members of staff, the Institute of Radiology and Nuclear Medicine at Klinik St. Anna is your first port of call for clarification of complex clinical pictures. 
                                
                            
                        

                            
                                
                                    
                                        Sports medicine st. anna im bahnhof
                                    
                                https://www.hirslanden.ch/en/klinik-st--anna/centers/sports-medicine.html
                                
                                    Sport Medicine St. Anna im Bahnhof is located on the 5th floor of Lucerne railway station and is committed to the prevention, diagnosis and treatment of injuries and diseases affecting the musculoskeletal system. 
                                
                            
                        

                            
                                
                                    
                                        Clinic for sleep medicine
                                    
                                https://www.hirslanden.ch/en/klinik-st--anna/centers/clinic-for-sleep-medicine.html
                                
                                    KSM Clinic for Sleep Medicine is a hospital specialising in sleep and, with its main location in Bad Zurzach and two further hospitals in Lucerne and Zurich, is an independent subsidiary of the Zurzach Care group of companies.
                                
                            
                        

                            
                                
                                    
                                        Department of internal medicine
                                    
                                https://www.hirslanden.ch/en/klinik-st--anna/centers/department-of-internal-medicine.html
                                
                                    The Department of General Internal Medicine cares for inpatients and outpatients.
